channel.title: Amulets dont wield correctly for males
channel.description:
Amulets dont wield correctly for males
[URL=http://s1199.photobucket.com/user/134cb/media/klmkm_zpsc98ddba2.png.html][IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa480/134cb/klmkm_zpsc98ddba2.png[/img][/URL]
but it does for females
[URL=http://s1199.photobucket.com/user/134cb/media/female_zps5b8d8c3b.png.html][IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa480/134cb/female_zps5b8d8c3b.png[/img][/URL]
anyone know what the problem is? this happens with all ammys such as amulet of power, amulet of accuracy etc but glory fits fine fury fits fine etc. its only a few that do it

item.title: Amulets dont wield correctly for males
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

i didnt mess with them at all, i’m using epicurus as a base and that’s how it came.
the problem fixes if i downgrade my character models to 474 etc where the models were more squareish, i think it has something to do with the height change jagex made when they moved up the character models

Read full topic
item.source: Amulets dont wield correctly for males

item.title: Amulets dont wield correctly for males
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Looks like the female is wearing the male’s model and the male is wearing the female’s model. Did you mess around with anInt165 and anInt200?

Read full topic
item.source: Amulets dont wield correctly for males

item.title: Amulets dont wield correctly for males
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Did you happen to have updated your character models?
